page.title: 04Soccer
page.content: Andrew Swan and I often go to the back of Mapperley Hospital on the fottball pitch. I've played football, watched football and enjoyed football all my life. My Dad used to and still does coach me everyday. I like to play football for myself but I also like to watch Notts County when they're playing at home, I also like to watch football on T.V. I've got all the dress for football, football boots, socks, shorts, gloves, shirts, trainers, tracksuit and of course a football. I play for school, Nottingham and Boy's Brigade. The season has now finished so I'll be playing for fun. My Dad's work often play football matchs (as fun between staff and workers) where I'm asked to play. I would like to eventually play for Notts County or Liverpool.
